customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
From First Stride to First Finish Line

Take your first stride, cross your first finish line, and celebrate every exciting moment in between with the Rivera 3.

image.alt: kneee down shot of lone peak 7

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
Run To New Heights

This fan-favorite neutral road shoe has an increased stack height. With 28mm of Altra EGO™ midsole foam, you’ll have a spring in your step whether you’re running a 5K or heading to yoga. With just the right amount of cushion and height, your feet will stay happy for miles.

Updated Upper

A redesigned tongue and updated layered mesh upper emphasize breathability. Let your feet feel cool and breezy, even if the outside temps rise. A molded heel collar hugs the back of your foot for a locked-in feel and flawless fit.

image.alt: runner coming downhill in the twilight

customhtml2_copy_cop.customHTML:
Stay Secure

Experience a secure and responsive feel with Slim FootShape™ Fit, which offers the perfect amount of space in the toe box for your feet to move naturally. Space and security. Who said you can’t have both?

image.alt: people overlooking a sunset in the woods
